Text: RE Amendment to FT Energy License AgreementWe need to add another amendment to extend the contract between EnronOnline and FT Energy another months The current amendment to the Dec original contract expires on March The new amendment should expire on June The amendment should be sent to Michele Markey Financial Times Walnut Street Boulder CO Tel Fax Michele also wanted to make sure that she had a street address to send it back to us I suppose to your location Thanks Tana Julie

RE Amendment to FT Energy License AgreementPlease see the email below with the information I am interoffice mailing you a copy of the signed amendment Thank you Julie Forwarded by Julie FerraraHOUECT on AM From Julie Ferrara PM To Tana CT cc Subject RE Amendment to FT Energy License Agreement Tana We need to add another amendment to extend the contract between EnronOnline and FT Energy another months The current amendment to the Dec original contract expires on March The new amendment should expire on June The amendment should be sent to Michele Markey Financial Times Walnut Street Boulder CO Tel Fax Michele also wanted to make sure that she had a street address to send it back to us I suppose to your location Thanks Tana Julie

New addendum to Intelligence Press ContractCan we please send a new addendum to the Intelligence Press Contract extending the exact contract another months The current addendum expires on April The addendum goes to Dexter Steis at Dexters phone number is Please let me know if you need further information Thank you Julie

Intelligence PressI sent a message to Dexter Steis at Intelligence Press to tell him to expect the amendment from you Also I faxed you the copy of the signed original Please ignore what I sent you in the interoffice mail Thanks Julie

Amendment to License AgreementHave you heard anything back from Intelligence Press on this amendment Dexter Steis from Intelligence Press said that were having their lawyer look over it but I havent heard anything else The original agreement expires on Wednesday Thanks Julie Forwarded by Julie FerraraHOUECT on PM From Tana Jones on AM To cc Julie CT Rahil nronXGate Mark NRON Subject Amendment to License Agreement At the request of Rahil Jafry I am attaching a copy of our proposed First Amendent to License Agreement which extends the term from February to April If the Amendment meets with your approval please execute it and return it to me via fax no If you have any questions or comments please call me at or Rahil at We look forward to hearing from you

New addendum to Intelligence Press ContractCan we please send a new addendum to the Intelligence Press Contract extending the exact contract another months The current addendum expires on April The addendum goes to Dexter Steis at Dexters phone number is Please let me know if you need further information Thank you Julie

Re EOL Gas PricesI spoke with someone in our technical team about the ability to provide the EnronOnline price reports in a downloadable format What I think we can do is send a csv file comma separated values to the O drive everyday containing all of the data that appears in the EnronOnline price reports Then you could just go in and open that it in Excel or copy and paste it from the csv file into Excel which is easy Let me know if I can explain this better As far as saving it on the O drive is concerned I am currently thinking that we would just create a new folder that EOL can access and you can access This way if any other desk has a similar request to yours they can just get permission to access that folder We are going to finalize the details and I will let you know how long it will take to get this done The technical person who can do it is out of the office until Thursday so I am assuming we wont have a good estimate until then I will keep you posted Thank you Julie Phillip M Love PM To Julie CT cc Dave CT Subject EOL Gas Prices I am hoping you will be the right person to talk with Rahil Jafry referred me to you I am the risk management lead for the Central Gas desk Currently our traders utilize an EOL weighted average gas price report on EOL to set their curves for the next gas day ie their curves set today for tomorrows gas flow I was first inquiring with EOL if they could possibly provide this report in downloadable formatexcel and they sent me to Rahil who then sent me to you Is this possible Please feel free to contact me for any additional information or if this is really confusing Please let me know if you are not the right person to contact and I will start over with EOL Thanks for your assistance in this matter Phillip

Re EOL Gas PricesThe Price Report file will display the information in the same columns as it does on the site so the format should be the same I dont think it is a problem to get it to the O drive by The price reports will start going to the folder on Monday February To make things easier for now is there a folder that you already have access to on the O drive that we can have this file sent to everyday Please let me know when you get a chance so we can get that folder name into the scripts Thanks Julie Phillip M Love PM To Julie CT cc Subject Re EOL Gas Prices Thanks for your help This sounds like a good fit for us The only issues I have or need addressed is for this file to have the same name and have the curves in the same cells so that we can just link to the file in our curve file The other concern is that the data be there by pm everydayprices for the next gas day Thanks so much for your help PL

Re EOL Gas PricesThe Price Report file will display the information in the same columns as it does on the site so the format should be the same I dont think it is a problem to get it to the O drive by The price reports will start going to the folder on Monday February To make things easier for now is there a folder that you already have access to on the O drive that we can have this file sent to everyday Please let me know when you get a chance so we can get that folder name into the scripts Thanks Julie Phillip M Love PM To Julie CT cc Subject Re EOL Gas Prices Thanks for your help This sounds like a good fit for us The only issues I have or need addressed is for this file to have the same name and have the curves in the same cells so that we can just link to the file in our curve file The other concern is that the data be there by pm everydayprices for the next gas day Thanks so much for your help PL

List of AccomplishmentsAttached is my list of accomplishments Please let me know if you need anything further Talk to you soon Julie
Enron Slides Cc a very recent presentation submitted to go on EnronOnline

Enron Slides Cc The attached presentations contain some Enron slides that you have used previously I am sending two more emails with other presentations I did not separate them out for the sake of time Let me know if you had something else in mind Thanks Julie

All Employee Meeting Draft Cc the update for today which corresponds with my voicemail that I left this evening I should have more content gathered for tomorrows update Also as an FYI I did email the draft of the New Orientation presentation on a blue background to Celeste for review first thing this AM I will be in touch Julie

Draft of All Employee Meeting Presentation Cc Attached is a draft of the All Employee Meeting presentation I know the cover and some other slides are NOT aesthetically pleasing so I asked graphics for some options I just thought I would send it anyway so you can review the textcontent I received the IT Compliance and GPG slides today but was not sure where you wanted them in the order I will send you a prettier version in my next update I hope you had a good trip to Brazil and I will stay in touch with Julie Ramos in case any unexpected setup issues arise for your presentation Thanks Julie

Cc Attached is the draft for the upcoming orientation I tried to update the Forrester graph with projections through however I dont have a BC projection for I have made some alternate slides that have some other research firms projections I will bring them up for you to look at when convenient I will keep working on it Thanks Julie
